title: Do you think you can manage? (TEFC)
creator_credit: Robert Reid, Video Arts and Michael Darlow
brief_description: A training film for office supervisors and their managers. Explores in personal and human terms the problems which can arise when a clerk is promoted, unprepared for a supervisory job, and suggests some basic and simple methods by which they can be avoided.
creator_credit_for_label: Robert Reid, Video Arts and Michael Darlow
